variables.name: svc
variables.description: The full/partial name of the service to get stats for. Format: ns/svc_name

variables.name: pod
variables.description: The full/partial name of the pod to get stats for. Format: ns/pod_name

variables.name: req_path
variables.description: The full/partial name of the request_path.

variables.name: start
variables.description: The relative start time of the window. Current time is assumed to be now
